attributes.additional_details: In the news this morning it said that there had been studies into if it should be introduced.
attributes.background: I feel as though kids will be more interested in school if they had the chance to be involved in something that can help them express themselves. Music is a big part of the community and I feel it is a great idea for it to be introduced in education.

rejection.details: It's up to schools what they teach as part of music lessons.
